title: Still Building My Set on a Budget - Looking to Spend $15-20/card
author: I Only Smoke 4 the Cards

posts.post_title: Still Building My Set on a Budget - Looking to Spend $15-20/card
posts.post_content:
Hi Guys,

I have slowly but surely been working on my set and am now up to 69 cards. I could not have gotten here without the awesome help from fellow board members. 

Please let me know if you have anything in that range. Obviously it is a range and I regularly spend above it for something good.

[quote name="I Only Smoke 4 the Cards" post=1141852]Hi Guys,

I have slowly but surely been working on my set and am now up to 69 cards. I could not have gotten here without the awesome help from fellow board members. 

Please let me know if you have anything in that range. Obviously it is a range and I regularly spend above it for something good.[/QUOTE]

I am still going after the Monster and am up to 116! I am currently going after commons and SLers. I am willing to pay above my listed price range for SLers. Rest assured that all of the cards I purchase are for my (small) personal collection and will not be resold.

Thank you to all of the members who have helped me along the way. 

Alex
Thank you for all of the responses. I appreciate the help.
